value:
$WmMPID_シャロン,ch00_02_Sharon_F_Normal,Face_Smile|Hey, everyone, I've got an idea!
Let's all...go on a picnic!$k$p$WmMPID_アンナ,ch00_03_Anna_F_Normal,Face_Smile|Hmm... That sounds pretty nice.
Let's do it!$k$p$EFace|But, uh...can someone remind me
what all goes into a picnic? You just
sit outside and eat, right? Is that...it?$k$p$WmMPID_アルフォンス,ch00_01_Alfons_M_Normal,Face|Well, one popular theory states the
practice began as a hunting trip
nobles engaged in when the wea—$k$p$WmMPID_シャロン,ch00_02_Sharon_F_Normal,Face|Alfonse! You stop right there! Don't
use such dusty old book words to
talk about the wonder of picnics!$k$pWhat's important is...everyone goes
outside, eats a nice packed lunch,
and relaxes! THAT'S a picnic!$k$pIs that clear?!$k$p$WmMPID_アルフォンス,ch00_01_Alfons_M_Normal,Face_Pain|...Yes, Sharena.$k$p$WmMPID_アンナ,ch00_03_Anna_F_Normal,Face_Pain|Got it, Sharena. Thanks. Now I know
what a picnic is...and that I should
never take them lightly.$k$p$WmMPID_シャロン,ch00_02_Sharon_F_Normal,Face_Smile|Great! Then we're all on the same
page. Now, let's get going already!$k$p$Sbs150|

$WmMPID_行楽ジェニー,ch10_13_Jenny_F_Picnic19,Face|Wow, what a cute lunch, Flora...
It looks almost too good to eat!$k$p$WmMPID_行楽フローラ,ch05_41_Flora_F_Picnic19,Face|Care to try some?$k$p$WmMPID_行楽ジェニー,ch10_13_Jenny_F_Picnic19,Face|Wow! May I? Thank you!$k$pOh my goodness... It's so tasty!
You're an amazing cook, Flora!$k$p$WmMPID_行楽フローラ,ch05_41_Flora_F_Picnic19,Face|Oh, you are too kind.$k$pBy the way...have you spotted my
younger sister here? She's dressed
similarly to me, if that helps...$k$p$WmMPID_行楽ジェニー,ch10_13_Jenny_F_Picnic19,Face|Hmm... No, I haven't seen her. But...
I can help you look for her! Especially
if her cooking is as great as yours.$k$p$WmMPID_行楽フローラ,ch05_41_Flora_F_Picnic19,Face|If you plan to try it yourself, I really
must recommend you...not. For your
own good.$k$p$WmMPID_行楽ジェニー,ch10_13_Jenny_F_Picnic19,Face|Huh? Why?$k$p$WmMPID_行楽フローラ,ch05_41_Flora_F_Picnic19,Face|Her cooking can be...overwhelming
for those who aren't prepared for
its...particular impact.$k$p$WmMPID_行楽ジェニー,ch10_13_Jenny_F_Picnic19,Face|"Impact"? "Overwhelming"? We are
still talking about food...aren't we?!$k$p

$SbpBGM_EVENT_PLAIN_03,0|$WmMPID_行楽フローラ,ch05_41_Flora_F_Picnic19,Face|With the contract in place, it seems
we can't avoid fighting... For now,
let's regroup with Felicia, Miss Genny.$k$p$WmMPID_行楽ジェニー,ch10_13_Jenny_F_Picnic19,Face|Of course. I'm right behind you.$k$p$Sbs150|
